recipe_text: Measurement; 300; Measure out 300 grams of eggplant, chopped| Measurement; 300; Measure out 300 grams of zucchini, chopped| Measurement; 300; Measure out 300 grams of yellow squash, chopped| Measurement; 60; Measure out 60 grams of olive oil| Measurement; 150; Measure out 150 grams of onion, chopped| Measurement; 10; Measure out 10 grams of garlic, minced| Measurement; 150; Measure out 150 grams of bell pepper, chopped| Measurement; 400; Measure out 400 grams of tomatoes, chopped| Measurement; 30; Measure out 30 grams of tomato paste| Measurement; 10; Measure out 10 grams of fresh basil, chopped| Measurement; 5; Measure out 5 grams of fresh thyme, chopped| Measurement; 5; Measure out 5 grams of salt| Measurement; 2; Measure out 2 grams of black pepper| Untimed; None; Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat| Untimed; None; Add onion and garlic to the pot and cook until softened| Untimed; None; Add eggplant, zucchini, yellow squash, and bell pepper to the pot| Untimed; None; Cook until vegetables are tender| Untimed; None; Stir in tomatoes, tomato paste, basil, thyme, salt, and black pepper| Untimed; None; Bring to a simmer| Timed; 3600; Simmer for 1 hour, stirring occasionally| Finish; None; Serve hot and enjoy!
title: Ratatouille Provencale
